types.description: An object describing a mail account, as returned for example by the :ref:`accounts.list` and :ref:`accounts.get` methods.

id.description: A unique identifier for this account.

name.description: The human-friendly name of this account.

type.description: What sort of account this is, e.g. <var>imap</var>, <var>nntp</var>, or <var>pop3</var>.

folders.description: The folders for this account. The property may be <var>null</var>, if inclusion of folders had not been requested.

rootFolder.description: The root folder associated with this account.

identities.description: The identities associated with this account. The default identity is listed first, others in no particular order.

functions.name: list
functions.description: Returns all mail accounts. They will be returned in the same order as used in Thunderbird's folder pane.

parameters.name: includeFolders
parameters.description: Specifies whether the returned :ref:`accounts.MailAccount` objects should include their account's folders. Defaults to <var>false</var>.

functions.name: list
functions.description: Returns all mail accounts. They will be returned in the same order as used in Thunderbird's folder pane.

parameters.name: includeFolders
parameters.description: Specifies whether the returned :ref:`accounts.MailAccount` objects should include their account's folders. Defaults to <var>true</var>.

functions.name: get
functions.description: Returns details of the requested account, or <var>null</var> if it doesn't exist.

parameters.name: includeFolders
parameters.description: Specifies whether the returned :ref:`accounts.MailAccount` object should included the account's folders. Defaults to <var>false</var>.

functions.name: get
functions.description: Returns details of the requested account, or <var>null</var> if it doesn't exist.

parameters.name: includeFolders
parameters.description: Specifies whether the returned :ref:`accounts.MailAccount` object should included the account's folders. Defaults to <var>true</var>.

functions.name: getDefault
functions.description: Returns the default account, or <var>null</var> if it is not defined.

parameters.name: includeFolders
parameters.description: Specifies whether the returned :ref:`accounts.MailAccount` object should included the account's folders. Defaults to <var>true</var>.

functions.name: setDefaultIdentity
functions.description: Sets the default identity for an account.
functions.deprecated: Deprecated since Thunderbird 91 and removed in Manifest V3: accounts.setDefaultIdentity() is now available as identities.setDefault.

functions.name: getDefaultIdentity
functions.description: Returns the default identity for an account, or <var>null</var> if it is not defined.
functions.deprecated: Deprecated since Thunderbird 91 and removed in Manifest V3: accounts.getDefaultIdentity() is now available as identities.getDefault.

events.name: onCreated
events.description: Fired when a new account has been created.

events.name: onDeleted
events.description: Fired when an account has been removed.

events.name: onUpdated
events.description: Fired when a property of an account has been modified. Folders and identities of accounts are not monitored by this event, use the dedicated folder and identity events instead. A changed ``defaultIdentity`` is reported only after a different identity has been assigned as default identity, but not after a property of the default identity has been changed.

name.description: The human-friendly name of this account.

defaultIdentity.description: The default identity of this account.
